channel.title: [Lore Suggestion] The Amnesiac
channel.description: There. Near death, one saw a person there... who remembers nothing. As that he remembers nothing, he tries to find who he is. He searches through Castle Adiart, but cannot find who he is. But as he tried to find he people are, he found their identities. Now, the Black Rose is trying to kill him. One night, when he tried to find who he is, the Black Rose tried to assassinate him. But, luckily he left the room, so he didn't die... at least yet. Now what has he become? A member of the Blue Dragon? The Cult? The Fool? Noone knows...

item.title: [Lore Suggestion] The Amnesiac
item.dc:creator: Bob
item.description:
There. Near death, one saw a person there… who remembers nothing. As that he remembers nothing, he tries to find who he is. He searches through Castle Adiart, but cannot find who he is. But as he tried to find he people are, he found their identities. Now, the Black Rose is trying to kill him. One night, when he tried to find who he is, the Black Rose tried to assassinate him. But, luckily he left the room, so he didn’t die… at least yet. Now what has he become? A member of the Blue Dragon? The Cult? The Fool? Noone knows…

Read full topic
